mods.abstract: Page 109 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [53] shows two men picking sugar beets in a field with a horse drawn wagon loaded with harvested sugar beets. A fence and farmhouse are shown in the background.; Photograph 2 [54] shows four sugar beet samples with greens intact. A folded ruler is used to illustrate scale.; Photograph 3 [55] shows three sugar beet samples with a yard stick used to illustrate scale.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
